dmca.title: Animez.info - Infringing Content Removal
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Peter Tatara [mailto:ptatara@teamcpm.com] 
Sent: Monday, November 21, 2005 8:45 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: crossfadeerror@yahoo.ca
Subject: Animez.info - Infringing Content Removal


ThePlanet.com / Animez.info:

Please take appropriate action to disable access to the infringing materials
described below, in accordance with the provisions of the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act of 1998.  Should you require further information from us
regarding this matter, please feel free to contact me.  I look forward to
your response that you have completed the requested action.

ELECTRONIC NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY, that I am authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property (IP) rights,
said owner being named:

Central Park Media. New York, New York, USA

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are not
authorized by the above IP owners, their agents, or the law and therefore
infringe upon the IP Owner's rights.  Please act expeditiously to remove or
disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.

I may be contacted at:

Peter Tatara
Assistant Marketing Manager
Central Park Media
250 W 57th St, Ste. 317
New York, NY 10107
212-977-7456 x239
 <http://www.centralparkmedia.com> www.centralparkmedia.com
 <mailto:ptatara@teamcpm.com> ptatara@teamcpm.com

All items listed below are digital files produced without authorization
or compensation to Central Park Media, the licensor of all the below IP.

Further, many have been ripped from Central Park Media's licensed DVDs.  The
following is a detailed list of the infringed works being offered by
animez.info, a site whose hosting has been traced back to
ThePlanet.com:
 
Legend Of Himiko
http://www.animez.info/condor/skins/atom/Legend%20of%20Himiko.torrent
 
Narue No Seikai
http://www.animez.info/condor/skins/atom/Narue_no_Sekai.torrent
 
Shamanic Princess
http://www.animez.info/condor/skins/atom/Shamanic_Princess_1-6.torrent
 
Urusei Yatsura: Beautiful Dreamer
http://www.animez.info/condor/skins/atom/Urusei_M%20.torrent
 
A Wind Name Amnesia
http://www.animez.info/condor/skins/atom/Wind.torrent

Other works on this site are infringing on other IP Owners.

Main infringing URL: http://animez.info/

I appreciate your understanding in this matter and expect that you will
remove our stolen materials immediately in accordance with the provisions of
the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998.

Sincerely,
/Peter Tatara/
Assistant Marketing Manager
Central Park Media
